FuncDef: This command enables unidirectional multi-point BFD session on a sender (Root) PE node for upstream fast failure detection over RSVP-TE P2MP LSP.

ParaDef.Info: Sets the transmit interval, in milliseconds. Values-10 to 100000. ParamDefault: Default- 100
Sets the multiplier for the BFD session. Values-3 to 20. ParamDefault: Default- 3
